title: Particle Identifiers
description: Validates particle effect identifiers for proper namespace formatting. Particle identifiers should follow the creator:name convention.

fields.title: File Read Error
fields.description: Error when the particle JSON file could not be read. Check file permissions and format.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the path to the unreadable file

fields.title: Version Read Error
fields.description: Error when the format_version field could not be read from the particle definition.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains details about the version parsing failure

fields.title: Invalid Identifier
fields.description: Error when a particle identifier doesn't follow the expected namespace:name format. Use your creator namespace prefix (e.g., mypack:custom_particle).
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the invalid particle identifier
